architectural_notes: Deployment constraints: Caffeine chat supports rebuild + 'Publish to live' but does not support asset flush / forced redeploy actions via chat.
Live vs draft behavior may differ due to caching layers (asset-canister, boundary nodes, browser cache).
known_issues: Draft works but live serves stale/incorrect frontend due to caching; user wants a clean-slate deploy (asset flush/force redeploy) but that action isn't available via chat; workaround is rebuild + publish (possibly repeated).

existing_features.title: Produce a new rebuild so the frontend build version changes (cache-busting) and the resulting build can be published to the live environment.

projectName: Rebuild the app to refresh live deployment caches
